info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 9:59PM EST until December 22 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The water reaches businesses on the low side of Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:46 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.9 feet and slowly receding. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 6.3 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Wed 9 pm: 8.9 Forecast: Thu 1 am 8.8 Thu 7 am 8.5 Thu 1 pm 8.3 Thu 7 pm 8.0 Fri 1 am 7.8 Fri 7 am 7.5 Fri 1 pm 7.3 Fri 7 pm 7.0 Sat 1 am 6.8 Sat 7 am 6.6 Sat 1 pm 6.4 &&
